response: {"message": "Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase our product. I think it's a game-changer and I believe it will greatly benefit your business. As a valued potential customer, I'm willing to make a special offer just for you. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you think?", "product_price": 1200000}
